msbt.message: Naturally, with Toy Day fast approaching, we're all thinking about exchanging gifts.After all, the only thing better than spending time with friends is shopping for them, .

As December marches on, a chill creeps into my heart as I recall the lessfestive Toy Days of my youth Never mind me! We should exchange gifts this year! We'll wrap them in pretty paper and whatnot! I will replace my darkest memories with happy new ones, by FORCE if necessary, .
With that gorgeous tree in the event plaza, it feels more like Toy Day than ever, !The decorations are adorable too. Isabelle's influence touches everything on !
